explore_items.title: Command-Line Interfaces
explore_items.description: All the algorithms are available using CLI. You can also create your own algorithms.

explore_items.title: Statistical Analysis
explore_items.description: DIPY allows you to use different methods like BUAN, AFQ, K-Fold cross validation.

explore_items.title: Reconstruction
explore_items.description:
Single shell: DTI, CSA, SFM, SDT, Q-Ball, CSD, and many more.
Multi shell: GQI, DTI, DKI, SHORE, MAPMRI, MSMT-CSD, and many more.

explore_items.title: Registration
explore_items.description: Affine Registration, Diffeomorphic 2D/3D Registration, Streamlines based Registration, and much more.

explore_items.title: Tractography
explore_items.description: Probabilistic Tracking, Deterministic Tracking, PFT Tracking, and much more.

explore_items.title: Denoising
explore_items.description: Affine Registration, Diffeomorphic 2D/3D Registration, Streamlines based Registration, and much more.

explore_items.title: Visualization
explore_items.description: ODFs visualization, interactive tractogram visualization, Advanced UI and Shaders, and much more.

explore_items.title: Pre-Processing
explore_items.description: Brain extraction, SNR estimation, Reslice Datasets, and much more.
